trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an operation in isolated storage fails.
trans-unit.target: 独立存储中的操作失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: `IsolatedStorageException` uses the HRESULT ISS_E_ISOSTORE, which has the value 0x80131450.
trans-unit.target: `IsolatedStorageException`使用 HRESULT ISS_E_ISOSTORE，其值 0x80131450。

trans-unit.source: The most common examples of isolated storage exceptions are as follows.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的独立的存储异常示例如下所示。

trans-unit.source: - Missing evidence.
trans-unit.target: -缺少证据。

trans-unit.source: Isolated storage requires evidence (information about the assembly and its origin) in order to determine the identity of the code and connect it to the correct associated file space.
trans-unit.target: 独立的存储需要证据 （有关程序集和其源信息），才能确定代码标识的并将其连接到正确关联的文件空间。

trans-unit.source: Without this information, isolated storage cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此信息，不能使用独立的存储。

trans-unit.source: - Invalid operations.
trans-unit.target: -无效的操作。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.IO.FileStream> operations are not supported for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.IO.FileStream>独立存储的不支持的操作。</xref:System.IO.FileStream>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of `IsolatedStorageException`, see the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表`IsolatedStorageException`，请参阅<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
